Major_Arcs.title: The Genesis of Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the origin of Human Meteor and his first interventions, starting with a taxi ride and culminating in a hospital visit and a stowaway plan linked to a mysterious yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Duke's Mundane Life
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage with the comic book cover introducing Human Meteor and then transitions to Duke's ordinary life as a taxi driver.

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and First Action
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Duke's transformation into Human Meteor and his initial confrontation with suspicious individuals, leading to a brief victory and a hospital visit.

narrative_arcs.title: Suspicious Sedan and the Human Meteor's Emergence

sub_scenes.title: Planning the Stowaway
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Duke's plan to investigate further by stowing away on the yacht mentioned in the hospital, setting up a new direction for the narrative.

Major_Arcs.title: The Yacht and Underwater Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the investigation around the yacht, revealing a sunken submarine and an underwater conflict, culminating in a dramatic escape and discovery.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Intrigue and Pete's Predicament
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Pete's actions on the yacht, his discovery of a suspicious chart, and his sudden fall overboard, raising suspicion and danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Pete's Yacht Duty and Suspicious Chart
Duke's Observation and Toby's Confirmed Action

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Submarine Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor's underwater intervention, the rescue of Pete, and the shocking discovery of a sunken Japanese submarine and its secret operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Rush and Pete's Rescue
Discovery of the Sunken Japanese Submarine
Inside the Submarine: Torpedo Loading Operation

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Conflict and Surface Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Human Meteor's underwater ambush, his escape, and subsequent retaliation against a surface attack, leading to a ship encounter.

narrative_arcs.title: Surface Attack and Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Surface Chaos and Cabin Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the surface reaction to the underwater attack, Peter's ambiguous condition, and Human Meteor's discovery of a depth map in Peter's cabin.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Map Discovery in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Unraveling Peter's Secret and Child Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Peter's connection to the navy, transitions to a flashback of Toby's rescue, and ends with the children's recovery in the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Drive Home and Future Growth
Bedtime and Anticipation of New Adventures

Major_Arcs.title: Shifting Scenes: Liberty Lads and Suburban Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces two parallel storylines: one featuring the 'Liberty Lads' in a confrontation against Nazis, and another focusing on a suburban mystery involving an ambulance and two boys.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the 'Liberty Lads' engaged in an armed standoff with Nazis, setting up a scene of conflict and tension.

sub_scenes.title: Suburban Ambulance Mystery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a suburban setting where two boys observe an ambulance arrival and become curious about the injured person, leading to the discovery of a wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person at the House

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Suspicious Salute
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to the garage, where the boys encounter a marine saluting a civilian, adding a layer of intrigue and introducing Major Bronson.

Major_Arcs.title: The Boys, the Wallet, and the Garage Ambush
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys' attempt to return the wallet, leading them into a dangerous ambush at the bus company garage and a sinister carbon monoxide poisoning plot.

sub_scenes.title: Approaching the Garage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys approaching the Transcontinental Bus Company garage with the intention of returning the wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: Approaching the Garage to Return the Wallet

sub_scenes.title: The Ambush and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the boys being ambushed by Mr. Horst, followed by interrogation and suspicion regarding the wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning and Suspicion about the Wallet
Wallet Examination and Discovery of Address

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Threat and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Mr. Horst's violent threat against the boys, interrupted by Major Bronson who proposes a sinister 'quieter' method of dealing with them.

Major_Arcs.title: Bronson's Betrayal and the Boys' Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the boys' near-fatal encounter with Horst's men, Major Bronson's unexpected betrayal and help, and their desperate escape to seek help.

sub_scenes.title: Imminent Danger and Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the henchmen attacking the boys and Mr. Horst reiterating his violent threat, emphasizing the immediate peril.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Turn and Escape Initiation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Major Bronson's sudden betrayal of Horst, his intervention to save the boys, and the beginning of their escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help

sub_scenes.title: Skip's Discovery and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: While Chuck seeks help, Skip discovers a secret office and sabotage plans, leading to a confrontation with foreign agents.

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Intervention and Victory Over Nazis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the Marines' response to the situation, their forceful intervention, and the subsequent victory over the Nazi spy ring, culminating in a hospital recovery scene.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Response
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the Marine Barracks receiving the warning and initiating a forceful response to rescue Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Confrontation and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaotic fight within the barracks, Skip's defense, and the confrontation leading to Major Bronson's rescue by Marines.

narrative_arcs.title: Nazi Rats' Taunt and Marine Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Victory and Hospital Recovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the conflict with the aftermath of the fight and a scene in the hospital where Major Bronson recovers and celebrates the victory over the Nazi spy ring.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Kidnapped President's Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry, their mission against Nazi agents, and their entanglement in the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter in South America.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Champ and the Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces 'The Champ' and Henry, setting up their heroic persona and their fight against Nazi agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion in South America
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts the setting to a South American town where suspicion arises about the presence of Americans, foreshadowing a confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery in South American Town and Impending Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Army Interrogation and Rosita's Kidnapping Revealed
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the interrogation by army officers, their abrupt departure, and the revelation of President Rosita's daughter's kidnapping as the reason for suspicion.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plot and Forced Journey
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene elaborates on El Tigre's plan and depicts the forced car ride leading to an encounter with Rosita's mother.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Car Ride and Arrival at Rosita's Mother's House

Major_Arcs.title: Rescuing Rosita from El Tigre
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the plan to rescue Rosita, the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, and the initial confrontation, setting the stage for a direct rescue attempt.

sub_scenes.title: Plea for Help and Hideout Intel
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Rosita's mother's plea for help and the crucial information she provides about El Tigre's hideout location.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Help and Intelligence from Rosita's Mother

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Diversion Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the men approaching El Tigre's hideout and formulating a plan to use stage dollars as a diversion.

narrative_arcs.title: Sneaking into El Tigre's Hideout and Planning a Diversion

sub_scenes.title: Diversion and Initial Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the execution of the diversion, El Tigre's reaction, and the attack on a guard, leading to the face-to-face encounter with El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Money Diversion and El Tigre's Distraction

Major_Arcs.title: Interrogation and Rosita's Absence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus from El Tigre to another interrogation scene, revealing Rosita's absence and escalating the tactics to find her location.

sub_scenes.title: Garbage Can Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a harsh interrogation scenario involving a small man being thrown into a garbage can and questioned.

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Missing and Escalated Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals that Rosita is not at the location and introduces a plan to use more forceful interrogation methods to find her.

narrative_arcs.title: Threat of Force for Rosita's Location

Major_Arcs.title: The Rescue Mission and Government Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the shift from interrogation to direct action for rescue, culminating in government troops' arrival and a victory against fascist forces.

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Rescue Call
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a brief misunderstanding resolved by urgent news about Rosita's location, leading to the initiation of a rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aggressive pursuit, forced entry, and strategic infiltration via a hotel in the rescue attempt.

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Final Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts finding Rosita, the ensuing brawl, and the dramatic intervention of government troops, leading to victory.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and the Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan and his jungle mission against an international spy ring, featuring intense combat, disobedience of orders, and a tragic personal loss.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle brawl and transitions to a military briefing about his 'grave matter'.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Brawl with Devil Dog Dolan
Reporting a Grave Matter to Captain Lawton

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the 'leatherneck' infiltrating the jungle, unaware of a hidden threat, and then being ambushed by native warriors.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival, Jungle Infiltration, and Hidden Threat

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Plan Extraction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the capture of a native man, Sinister Grauer's commands, the torture of a man for sub detector plans, and the successful extraction of those plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Capture and Initial Search of the Native Man
Preparation for Torture and Forced Compliance
Cooperation and Information Exchange with Foreign Agent

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Loss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan confessing to arson, the chaos resulting from it, and the tragic loss of Sam in the fire, fueling Dolan's vengeance.

narrative_arcs.title: Sam's Sacrifice and Dolan's Vengeful Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Vengeance and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dolan's vengeful attack on the natives, his surprising victory, and the subsequent alliance formed with them.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain Grauer's Dilemma and Shore Leave Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Captain Grauer's internal conflict due to his captured son, Sam, and transitions to a scene of intense brawls and a peculiar act of discipline administered by Dolan.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Moral Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Captain Grauer's dilemma between duty and his fatherly love for his captured son, Sam.

sub_scenes.title: Fierce Brawls and American Spirit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases intense brawls with a nationalistic undertone, emphasizing the 'American' fighting spirit.

sub_scenes.title: Shore Leave Reward and Spanking Discipline
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions to the aftermath, showing Dolan being rewarded and then administering a bizarre form of discipline to another officer.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Reward and Service Spanking

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline featuring the 'Twinkle Twins' and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them through clues, hospital visits, and a community rescue effort.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'Twinkle Twins' and sets the stage for their story as 'blood-stained murderers' fighting against ruthless killers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: News Assignment and Initial Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the news assignment given to Dan and Diane to investigate the banker's murder and their initial information gathering.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly's Illness

sub_scenes.title: Blood Type Mystery and Conspiracy Unveiled
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene uncovers the blood type issue for Miss Reilly, Dan and Diane's decision to inform Elijah, and a news broadcast revealing a wider conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Inform Elijah and Phone Call

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and the Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Dan and Diane's search for Tom Reilly, their conversation with Mrs. Murphy revealing crucial information, and their subsequent ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation and the Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Chase, and Community Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dan and Diane's separate escapes from the ambush, the ensuing car chase, and the intervention of the Irish neighborhood residents.

narrative_arcs.title: Diane's Cab Chase and Irish Blockade
Irish Neighborhood Intervention and Police Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Wait and Community Blood Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aftermath of the chase, the arrival at the hospital, the urgent need for blood, and the community's generous response to save Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hospital and Anxious Wait
Urgent Need for Blood Transfusion and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call and Community Response for Blood Donors

sub_scenes.title: Justice for Reilly and Lassie's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twin's story arc with plans to apprehend Farnacci, the police raid, and a celebratory scene marking Lassie's recovery and the resolution of the immediate threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Police Involvement
Police Raid and Confrontation at the Poolroom
